data.eml:eml: A new species of Diplocentrus (Arachnida: Scorpiones) from Oaxaca, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santibáñez, Carlos E., López, -, Francke, Oscar F. (2008): A new species of Diplocentrus (Arachnida: Scorpiones) from Oaxaca, Mexico. Zootaxa 1742: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181533
